name: TXP_INTESTINE_STATUS_AUD
description: The audit trail for the intestine status of the patient.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IN_STATUS_AUDIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the audit trail information for the intestine status for the transplant episode.

columns.name: IN_ST_AUDIT_DT
columns.description: Audit trail item for intestine status date.

columns.name: IN_ST_RSN_OTH_AUD
columns.description: Stores the audit trail information for the free-text reason for the intestine status for the transplant episode.

columns.name: IN_ST_UPDATE_USR_ID
columns.description: Stores the user responsible for the corresponding update to the intestine status for the transplant episode.

columns.name: IN_ST_UPDATE_USR_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: IN_ST_UPDATE_INST_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant on which the corresponding update to the intestine status was changed for the transplant episode.

columns.name: IN_ST_CHANGE_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of audit event that occurred to the intestine status
